poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
poison_sting.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

smog.name: Smog
smog.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

pin_missile.name: Pin Missile
pin_missile.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

poison_gas.name: Poison Gas
poison_gas.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
effects: 10% chance to lower Special Defense by 1 stage

acid_armor.name: Acid Armor
acid_armor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.
